about.title: About First Aluminum Technology
about.subtitle: Leading the Future of Food Packaging
about.description: First Aluminum Technology is a premier B2B supplier specializing in disposable food packaging solutions. With years of experience in the industry, we provide high-quality aluminum foil containers, disposable food boxes, and eco-friendly chopsticks to businesses worldwide.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: First Aluminum Technology (Luoyang) Co., Ltd is located in the National University Science Park in Luoyang City, the famous historical town in the middle of china. Our main product line includes container foil, household foil, pharmaceutical foil and lamination foil for packaging industry as well as catering foil and foil containers for daily use.
story.paragraph2: First Aluminum Technology has been invested twenty million yuan at the first stage to equip over 10 automatic production lines for foil splitting, sheet cutting, lubricating, foil container manufacturing, catering foil and baking paper rolling etc, with advanced PP shrinking and packaging facilities.
story.paragraph3: More than meeting the universal demands on aluminum foil, we can split the foil into different width and length to match orders from different clients, hence to guarantee our supply while controlling the cost properly, thus to gain the cost-performance ratio and our competitiveness.
story.paragraph4: We mainly supply aluminum foil of thickness from 0.0058mm to 0.15mm with length between 2 meters and 36000 meters, Both the wrinkle wall and smooth wall foil containers can be produced in various shapes as required, using plain foil or coated foil in different colors or paintings. The disposable foil containers, catering foil and baking paper we produce are distributed not only all over China but also in EU, North and South America, Middle-East and other parts of Asia. We own several patents on techniques and products and run under certificates including ISO9001 Quality Management System,ISO 14001 Environmental Management System and ISO 45001 Occupational Healthy and Safe Management System.Our products are BRC, BSCI,LFGB, SGS and FDAcertificated. First Aluminum Technology is not only supported by the professional production team but also by ambitious marketing and sales crew, We are always working on providing high quality products with remarkable service and pure honesty to make a win-win situation. First Aluminum Technology (Luoyang) Co., Ltd sincerely hope to cooperate with global clients and to share the business achievement.

products.question: What products do you manufacture?
products.answer: We specialize in: • Aluminum foil containers - For takeaway, catering, airline meals, baking • Household & catering aluminum foil rolls - Various sizes and specifications • Silicone baking paper - With or without custom print • Related custom packaging materials - Tailored to your needs. We support both OEM & ODM projects with comprehensive customization options.
